column5: My kids love going to the pond every year at the Ex.  Going on Thursday, hope to see you there if you're volunteering again.   Nick

Why did they choose the Ex ?  All my young years I went, there was never a fishing pond.  The only ones I seen as a kid and taking my kids, was at the sportsmen show.  No disrepect here, good on yas.  Just asking the reason.

Lots of Kids go threw the Farm building & the booth is right in the middle of it, plus the CNE pays him to go, line ups for fishing & casting all day, it's hard to get away for something to eat & I take lots of drinks cause I need my Diet Coke. Thanx & Tight Lines SBK
Nice going Richard! Good to see the younger kids taking an interest. We certainly need those younger kids to carry the torch.
Well done Richard!  I love the school program youve got going!   Great to see!
Back down today, Aug 29 & Sept 2 about 4pm - 10pm Tight Lines SBK
